title: Micah, The Fierce Aches For Emma, The Brave
description: The sizzling chemistry between Micah and Emma has finally boiled over. In part 4, they wrestle with their feelings for one another. Undone by her last encounter with Micah, Emma struggles to overcome heartbreak and deception. Bewildered by his longing for Emma, Micah spirals into a slump that threatens to end his career. When they meet again, will sparks fly? The beloved Micah and Emma series will take you on a wild ride as they explore sex, love and commitment. They have many adventures and will take you to some unexpected places. Check out all of their stories from the Micah, The Fierce Takes On Emma, The Brave (Pt. 1)Micah, The Fierce Nails Emma, The Brave (Pt. 2)Micah, The Fierce Dominates Emma, The Brave (Pt.3)Micah, The Fierce Aches For Emma, The Brave (Pt. 4)
author: Jessa Eden
